import React, { Component, Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import Board from './board' import Timer from './timer' import PrimarySearchAppBar from './myAppBar' import { Button, Card, Typography, Box } from '@material-ui/core' function Ui({ parentState, handleEvent, onChangeRowsNum }) { const rolls = parentState.rolls; const rollsProgressive = parentState.rollsProgressive; console.log('children rolls ', rolls); return ( Match {rollsProgressive} {(rolls.length > 0 && typeof (rolls) !== 'undefined') ? :
} ) } export default Ui
